cleaned_text: Official websites use .mil Secure .mil websites use HTTPS We provide force health protection enhancement of organic preventive medicine assets and rapid assessment of health threats in a theater of operations with the objective of either prevention or control. We also support Navy medical leaders who make Navy preventive medicine policy and medical department personnel who identify, evaluate, monitor, and respond to diseases, injuries, and environmental factors that threaten human health. EXPEDITIONARY PLATFORM We provide training and support for the Navy Environmental and Preventive Medicine Units and the Forward Deployable Preventive Medicine Units.
